sourcesContent:
<template>
  <NkDialog :closeDialog="closeDialog" header="Rezervasyon Düzenleme">
    <template #contents>
      <FullCalendar  />
    </template>
  </NkDialog>
</template>

<script>

import FullCalendar from '@fullcalendar/vue3';
import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/vue3';
import {ref} from "vue";

export default {
  name: 'editBookingDialog',
  components: {FullCalendar},
  props: {
    userId: {
      type: Number,
      required: true
    },
    closeDialog: {
      type: Function,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  setup() {
    const calendarOptions = ref({
      plugins: [dayGridPlugin],
      initialView: 'dayGridMonth',
      events: [
        {
          title: 'Event 1',
          start: '2023-11-01',
          end: '2023-11-03',
        },
        {
          title: 'Event 2',
          start: '2023-11-05',
        },
        // Diğer etkinlikler burada tanımlanabilir
      ]
    })
    return {
      calendarOptions
    }
  }
}
</script>
<script setup>
</script>
